selected_links.title: Waste Management Service - Online Forms | Stafford Borough Council
strengths: Offers online forms for reporting missed bin collections
Includes options for requesting new bins
selected_links.reasoning: This link offers online forms to report missed bin collections and also includes the option to request a new bin.

context.need: I forgot to put my bin out and need to report that I would like it collected.

recommendation.reason: Link appears suitable for user needs
next_steps: Follow the link to access the content

Reason.need: I forgot to put my bin out and need to report that I would like it collected.
Reason.answer_quality: The content does not directly address this question. There is no specific section or button for 'Missed Bin Collection' in the online forms page.
Reason.reasoning: The provided content only contains links for permits, new bin, replacement bin and recycling services, but not for reporting missed collections. A resident seeking to report a missed bin collection would have difficulty finding relevant information from this site.
Reason.next_actions: I would contact the council's customer service directly through phone or email to report my missed bin collection.

analysis.overall_assessment: The content provides links for several online forms related to waste management services, but it lacks a section for reporting missed collections. As a result, residents who need to report a missed bin collection may experience difficulties and frustration when using the website.
